website_summaries.verdict: An extremely functional hat that has a little less coverage than other options.
pros: External drawstring cord, removable chin cord
Hidden headband and mesh-lined crown wick away moisture
Colors include saddle, shade, pewter, and sand
cons: May run small for some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking hat ever
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from another Outdoor Research hat (the Sun Bucket) to this one for its wider brim. The Sombriolet has saved my head, face and neck from the sun for many trail miles, including the length of the John Muir Trail. It keeps its shape even when soaked (it is not water resistant, but I wasn't looking for that) and dust and sweat clean off with just fresh water. Seems like it will last for many many years. Great hat!
customer_reviews.author: grn4jd

customer_reviews.title: you can feel comfortable about the size factor
customer_reviews.text: I rated this as somewhat large because I have a very small head and there not being a small size concerned me. With the adjuster cord I could make it tight enough to keep the hat on in the wind. So for those concerned about that, you can feel comfortable about the size factor. This brim is extra wide, which really protects your face, ears, and neck. It is very light weight. It kept it's shape throughout the 2 week trip. You will not be a fashion queen in this hat. At 104, I hardly cared. I would call it functionable. Expensive, but was everything I needed or wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy J

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, not great shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love the hat. It looks cool, fits well, is breathable, and keeps the sun off my head/neck. The company that shipped it though, they suck. It was taped up in a re-used bag (which is fine I'm ok with recycling things) but the way they packaged it bent the hat and it has a crease in it now. This was, in effect, like buying this hat used off ebay, but maybe worse depending on how someone packages something/takes care of the product. I'll still use the hat, might return it, but was disappointed in the company that shipped it. So yeah 5 stars for the hat (in good, new condition) 1 star for the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bobel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold shape
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is light and airy. That's a good thing in Florida in the summer. It seems to have some sort of wire on the outside of the light weight brim and it tends to twist out of shape. It is of no use in any kind of wind as the brim will just flip up. I use it when I mow the lawn, but not much good for anything else. My light Tilly hat also flips up, but, at least, it holds it's shape. Have a hat from Colibar that does better than either, but it is heavier and hotter. A good hat is hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Mine was incorrectly constructed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat from Amazon in 2015 and I'm unsure why I didn't bother returning it or writing a scathing review back then. The top of mine is not correctly oriented with the brim. This is not just cosmetic, either, as not only is the logo off center but the oval shape that conforms to the head, too, such that the front edge against my forehead is actually the flat side of the oval rather than the comfortable rounder portion. It'd probably be a better hat that's less embarrassing if it was built right.
customer_reviews.author: Reticuli

customer_reviews.title: it's a cult following..
customer_reviews.text: what do you say about the nearly perfect, long lasting sun hat that has a worldwide fan base? this one seems (medium) to fit my head a little tighter than the one I replaced (lost). maybe I've gotten a big head with all this cool hiking gear. ha! this is my third OR sombiolet, and they are increasingly hard to find. i'd better not lose this one..
customer_reviews.author: M. Stivers

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well-made, solid hat I don't want to ever lose
customer_reviews.text: If you wear a hat every day, and take it off outside your home/car, it will have about a one-year lifetime before it's lost, never to be located again. So, I'm guarding this wonderful accessory carefully. Fits great, thick (but not too much so) fabric, even stylish in an anti-style way, I feel better wearing this hate than any other I own.
customer_reviews.author: Teh Arbitrageur

customer_reviews.title: too small!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this hat was really small! I have the Outdoor research Urban sombrero in XL and that fits perfectly, but I found this hat to be extremely small. I do have a large head, but this hat was super tight. ;-( Even my hubby who has an average head found this to be tight too. The brim is large and foam-ish, so it'll go straight out, and not flop around. But I can't get over the circumference. This is definitely going back. Boo. It's well made and I like the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Geojody

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat. I wear it 3 seasons of 4. During this time, it is mostly worn daily during my trips outside with my son to the park or bike riding or just being outside doing nothing in particular with him. So, I get a lot of use out of this hat. It washes well, which I was surprised with after some extensive sweat stains. Through it all, this think still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Made in CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight yes, comfortable yes and no. It's not as breathable as I expected. The comfort stems from how light weight it is. I often find myself taking it off to get my head some air on hot summer days. Brim is quite flimsy and it flips up during a light wind. It dries very fast after getting wet. The sweat band does a poor job, as Ive noticed sweat bleeding through to the brim area.
customer_reviews.author: OkieD

customer_reviews.title: This hat can take abuse and it keeps it shape
customer_reviews.text: I had tried several sun hats through Amazon. This one, by far, was the best. The brim is large enough to shade my neck, but not so large to look dorky. Some of the others I tried were OK, but under windy conditions, the front brim would fold back on itself, thereby providing no sun protection on your face. This hat is firm enough that that doesn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: J. West

customer_reviews.title: Terrific purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a sun hat for hiking and general activities. While I feel he shouldn't wear this all the time I think it's doing a great job minimizing exposure to the sun. Overall this is a very positive experience with this hat!
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sun hat
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect sun hat. It provides great sun protection, it’s very light weight, looks good, and has good air vents. The visor covers the face, ears, and back of the neck. A minor complaint is that the XL is a little small on me. The Outdoor Research hat sizing chart says that XL fits US hat sizes 7-5/8 to 7-7/8, but I wear a 7-7/8 and this hat feels like a 7-5/8. I made sure that the adjustable inner “cinching” cord is all the way loosened. In any case, it fits well enough so I’m going to keep it, and it’s my new favorite hat.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: great hat, brim a little wide for me
customer_reviews.text: great hat, brim a little wide for me. Also, the older version had Velcro on the sides where you could fold the sides up. This was useful when mowing because the brim would capture the motor noise and make the motor noise very loud. If it had the Velcro and a slightly smaller brim I would give it 5 stars. All other features are great but I did like the older version from 20 years ago better (I still have that hat).
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, very comfortable, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this hat the entire summer. I got it for when I was out kayaking, and it was perfect. If you're afraid it won't fit...the back has an adjustment to tighten it up. For me it was a perfect fit. It kept the sun out of my face and protected the back of my neck from the sun. It looks a bit large, but it's so comfortable that you don't really notice or think about it. It's just there, doing what it's supposed to do, no discomfort, I forgot I was even wearing it. For me, that's huge. I love this hat, and will replace it with another just like it if something ever happens to it.
customer_reviews.author: BeautifulMind

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight, but not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I believe the hat is NOT promoted as waterproof, but is a sun hat. It's very light weight, and I thought it might be water resistant enough to take on a vacation, but ultimately decided to go with the Seattle Sombrero (by OR) to be safe. I really liked the weight of this hat better, so if you are not going to be in torrents of rain, this might work just fine for you. For what it is advertised as, it seems like a fine hat.
customer_reviews.author: Anita G Doran

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Protects, Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Outdoor Research products for 20+ years... This particular hat is lightweight and protects my neck and face from the sun. I use it during all my outdoor activities - it is not as wide or heavy as other styles of OR hats which is why I love this one for Spring and Summer... Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L. Reisterer

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy and saggy all the time
customer_reviews.text: This hat doesn't hold up to the riggers of yard work. The top of the hat is always laying flat. It looks like a pancake. Basically I'd say the hat is too flimsy as the brim does not stay flat and I like a little bigger brim to keep the sun off the neck and face. The fastener strap becomes loose all the time and the hat falls off during stooping over or windy. Wished I never purchased the hat.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus L Tibesar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design. One down-side
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design. One down-side: hat doesn't recover well from crushing (e.g. if packed with gear to go along with a trip). It can flatten and recover (and this is how it is shipped). However, any asymmetric lateral crushing makes it permanently asymmetric. This is really a pity as its intended "sit" is both elegant and effective (as you can see from the display photo). Lose that and it becomes a bit "just another hat." There are other hats out there which do recover from crushing (cf. Duluth Trading's Crusher hat <>) In addition: this is another example of well thought-through design by this co. (Outdoor Research). They deserve respect.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer X, LA

customer_reviews.title: Medium is a little snug for my wife
customer_reviews.text: I have a extra large, which fits me just fine (7 5/8 hat size). Ordered a medium for my wife, whose hat size is much smaller, but it is a bit too snug for her. Gave the medium to our 11 year old daughter (who inherited my large head) and ended up ordering a large for my wife. I like the sun protection and it doesn’t get too hot on my head in hot weather. Full disclosure, I live in the PAC NW, so oppressively hot is above 80 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Great hat perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I got this hat for a trip to Phoenix AZ. I fits just right, and I can tighten it down if I want to. Great protection from the sun. If the wind is blowing I can use the chin strap. I also used it at a theme park and wore it on the rides, even on a 65 mph roller coaster. I am very happy, and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott V

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat but...
customer_reviews.text: I know someone that has had one of these for over 10 years. My North Face that is very similar wore out after 2 1/2 years. Nice hat but the rim has a mind of its' own. Takes the shape as shown in the picture and I can't seem to change its' mind. Maybe over time. I might have to run over it and wash it a few times. Only real downside is the band doesn't have any cushion/padding and the string used for adjusting the size leaves a crease in my forehead even when adjusted to fit lightly. It does stay on better in the wind than the North Face.
customer_reviews.author: johninwinky

customer_reviews.title: One of the two best hats I own, love the big brim
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wide brim. Keeps cool too, thanks to vents near the top. You will need extra protection for your neck, like a neck gaiter. Also, at low angles, the sun will still get your face, so again, a neck gaiter can be a helpful complement to this hat. Carefully follow washing instructions or the brim will warp and will have to be flattened by heavy objects. I put the in the washing machine once (which is not recommended) and then had to flatten it for a couple of days afterward. (Otherwise the hat was fine, but a washing machine may wear it out quickly with repeated washings.) You're better off washing the hat by hand.
customer_reviews.author: resi5

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I use the hat for outdoor pickleball. The wide brim keeps the sun off the back of the neck and forehead depending which way I am facing. It is washable. Medium fits fine and my head circumference is 21 1/4
customer_reviews.author: J. Mah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat for a trip to Death Valley as I have a high risk for skin cancer. I also wore it while working on hurricane relief in the Virgin Islands and Texas this fall. This is solidly made and the wide brim provides excellent protection for full face and neck. It also packs very well and the brim stays down in fairly strong breezes. In 100 degree heat, it stayed cool enough to keep on. Definitely worth the money if you want max protection in heavy sun.
customer_reviews.author: pbrown

customer_reviews.title: Hat is great, Amazon completely folded it in half to ship it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light weight all day hat. I have had a few of these in different colors and will keep buying them as long as they keep making them. The biggest drawback is walking around with a huge "OR" on your forehead all the time. If you are an Oregon fan its a ready made hat for you. To the manufacturer, give us non-logo option please. People keep asking me why I root for that team.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sun hat that has everything I ever want
customer_reviews.text: Very happy about purchase. My requirements: a sunscreen hat to shield my eyes and neck from sun, light weight, easily packed in luggage without bending, quality material and construction, stylish (not dorky looking), and reasonably priced. This hat sstifies all of my requirements. Want to share my experience, so others can benefit from having this option.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Others in the group bought Sun hats and they were jealous of my Outdoor Research.
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a sun hat before. Took this on a two week hiking trip in the deserts of Utah and Mountains of Colorado. I absolutely loved it. I was not looking forward to slathering up with sunscreen when water was limited, and no showers for days. This kept the sun off the face and shoulders an I didn't use sunscreen for the whole trip. It looks better on the head than the pictures show, its light weight and drys fast. Others in the group bought Sun hats and they were jealous of my Outdoor Research.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas M Austin

customer_reviews.title: Best sun protection around!
customer_reviews.text: Wow - one of the best purchases I made this year. The fabric is incredibly lightweight, but provides amazing coverage. I highly recommend for any golfer or beach-goer. An additional nice perk is the flexible frame. You can fold it up and it fits in your golf bag or beach bag really nicely. I travel with it all the time. Also, the sizing seems to be spot on. I have a 7 3/4 head, and the XL fits perfectly. Great item - highly recommend if you want to protect yourself from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, cool, and cute
customer_reviews.text: The hat travels well, and provided excellent protection on our trip close to the equator. I use it regularly during our Alabama summer. As far as "water resistance" - it doesn't repel water exactly, but when it does get wet, it dries very quickly, which means it's much more breathable than a regular water repellent hat. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Boat Hat
customer_reviews.text: I had the same hat in a different color but mistakenly left it in my boat while driving down the highway and it blew away. I loved the hat so much that I bought the same hat in this blue color and love it! It does an excellent job keeping the head cool and not blowing off due to the chin strap. The material is of good quality and it cane become pretty much flat for storage when not in use. I'll definitely buy again if I lose this one too! The blue color looks great and the XL size fits my larger head perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: IrixGuy's Adventure Channel

customer_reviews.title: and it's been keeping me cool in the desert like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hat for over a year now, and it's been keeping me cool in the desert like a champ. The elasticized terrycloth headband keeps it on my head without feeling like it's clamping down too hard, the brim is wide enough to keep the sun off me, and the hat is very light-weight. I got an XL because I have a freakishly large noggin, and most hats are usually too tight. This hat is a bit larger than I expected, and I could have maybe gone with the Large size. The XL still grips my head okay due to the elastic in the headband, but I worry about it coming off in high wind.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N

customer_reviews.title: You will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and keeps you safe and cooler. Very comfortable and looks like the picture one you head. Not like some that look great until you put it on. Great design! Very much recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hat! It fits well, the ties are well placed and function well under the chin to keep the hat on on blustery days. It looks great on the beach or in the city. Definitely worth the few extra dollars to get something of this quality. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: luvdemhuskies

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: I spend pretty much all day out in the sun. Unfortunately I'm also bald, so I have to have my head covered. I love this hat. It keeps the sun off my head and neck (it has the widest brim I could find) and it's lightweight enough that I don't notice that it's on. Brim has foam inside, so the hat floats. Wire around the edge keeps the brim looking good, but doesn't seem to get get easily been up... I've crammed it into many-a-backpack, and it always comes out looking nice. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: thatguy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I took this hat on a trip to Greece and it performed well in very sunny and hot conditions. The venting is very effective and the size of the hat provides a lot of shelter from the sun. It packs well - nice and flat in the suit case. I could even fold it in half to put it in my back pack. My only negative comment - and it is not a big one - is that the front of the brim flops a lot in the wind. The strap helps keep the hat on your head in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: D Runner

customer_reviews.title: and in the seven years I have delivered mail I have never purchased a better hat than this one
customer_reviews.text: I am a mail carrier, and I walk outside in the sun for 5 to 6 hours every day. Every summer I buy a new hat to protect my face and neck from the sun, and in the seven years I have delivered mail I have never purchased a better hat than this one. The best thing about this hat is it does not absorb my sweat, and I sweat from my head a lot. I have been forced to buy a new hat every year because I sweat so much. So far it seems I may have found a hat that I will be able to continue using for multiple summers.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Foldable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Super great hat! Just the wrong color for me. Surprising keeps your head somewhat cool. This folds just ok but may leave a crease that is annoying. Other than that I like this one a lot!
customer_reviews.author: ahiker4u

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how cool this is
customer_reviews.text: I have a 21-1/2" head, and the medium size fit. Don't know how cool this is, but it's a hat so how cool can it really be? I'm glad I got the Sombriolet and not the sombrero. Sombriolet was just big enough. **** UPDATE **** I bought this hat specifically to shield my face from the sun. It's perfect! The adjustable strap really comes in handy as it can be very windy where I live; the hat stays in place. I believe my money was well spent. If you're thinking about buying one, whatever the style, lay your $$ down, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Blesssed beyond measure

customer_reviews.title: Wide Rim Rubbed on my Pack.
customer_reviews.text: I like this hat but the back rim of the hat would constantly rub on my pack. That was very annoying. I shifted to my baseball cap and enjoyed that much more.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Great as you'd expect from OR
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these, being bald full coverage is important. Light and breathable, and dries quick. I've got 2, and they're fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: NICE! Outdoor Research Sombriolet Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my daughter who is a Colorado summer camp director and one for myself, an avid RVer and fishing kayaker. Nice fit, stone color does not hold heat, lightweight, thinner headband so less sweating. A bit snug, but would not go a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Taylor-Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great hats.  XL is big.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these hats. I love them. My first one was a Large. When I ordered my next two, I had forgotten what size my first one was, so I ordered two new XLs. I have a fairly large melon, (7 and 5/8?) but the XL is a tad big for me. Fortunately, they have an adjustment/drawstringy thing, so I can make them fit OK. Great hats. I just goofed and ordered a size too big. I still wear them all summer. Not too hot and they keep the sun off of your head.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: My "Go To" Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: I tried on a bunch of hats at sporting goods stores and narrowed my search down to the OR Sombriolet and similar hats made by Sunday Afternoons. I went with the Sombriolet because I like the removable chin cord and vented design. It's light-weight and reasonably stylish for a functional sun hat. However, I'd prefer a roomier fit and had a less prominent logo.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Favorite Hat
customer_reviews.text: I sweat. A lot. This hat actually helps me control that. It lets my head breathe while blocking out the sun. It is very light-weight and I wear it everyday in the summer, I used it for my archaeology excursion and it was extremely dirt resistant. I used it in the dirt everyday. I touched it with my dirty hands everyday. i can't even see sweat rings anywhere on it which is amazing. I ruin several hats from sweat rings and this hat keeps on trucking. You can mash it, smash it, fold it, pack it; and it will always hold its original form. I use it for golfing, fishing, hiking, etc. One of my best purchases.
customer_reviews.author: ReelJV

customer_reviews.title: Another great OR product.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, great coverage from sun. Did better that expected in wind and packed surprisingly well. Not yet sure how it will perform in hot, humid weather... overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Cheetah

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hat! My head size is exactly a medium, I ordered that, and the hat fit perfectly. It has a drawstring in the back of the crown for small adjustments. Inside, it has a mesh that covers the top of your head. No sunlight gets in from the outside as some other so-called sun-hats do. This hat has a small vent on each of the four sides of the crown that will allow some air through but no sunlight. If you're bald on top, this is perfect. The brim is 4" wide and has a dark underside to reduce reflections. And it looks good - I get compliments. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I thought that universally a medium was 22.5 inches. But this medium hat is tight on my head. Disappointed the hat didn’t fit the way a medium should. OR should provide the proper measurements for each size of their hats. Waste of my time/purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sagebelle

customer_reviews.title: Mesh lining is not soft
customer_reviews.text: This hat is very fitted with a wide brim. Not thrilled with the look of it even with a somewhat adjustable brim. The main issue is the hat has a mesh lining that feels surprisingly stiff. So not sure how comfortable this would be esp with the snug fit. Not the first hat of plan on wearing for a long hike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: MUCH BETTER THAN MY 3 TILLY HATS COSTING MORE THAN TWICE ...
customer_reviews.text: USED IT ON 92 DEGREE N, HUMID DAY, 125 DEGREES IN OPEN SUN. DID THE JOB PERFECTLY. VERY LIGHT WEIGHT. AFTER 40 MINUTES IN 1:00PM SW FLORIDA DIRECT SUN....WENT INTO SHADE AND IMMEDIATELY CHECKED FOR ANY HEAT BUILD-UP TRAPPED UNDER HEAD.....FELT ALMOST NONE. MUCH BETTER THAN MY 3 TILLY HATS COSTING MORE THAN TWICE THE PRICE.LARGE RIM WITH DARKENED UNDERSIDE MORE THAN AMPLE TO PROTECT EYES, NOSE AND EAR TIPS FROM SUN CANCER THREAT. GOOD VENTILATION THROUGH INNER MESH CONSTRUCTED HAT VENTS. WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbi / Coach

customer_reviews.title: HAT BRIM  CAN BE SHAPED FOR STYLE
customer_reviews.text: Good quality hat perfect for hot humid days---it has vents around the crown to let air circulate.The brim is lined beneath with a black material of which keeps the sun's rays from reflecting off the sand or water onto your face I chose large for a 22.5 inch head measurement There is a cord toggle around the crown to tighten for a snug fit
customer_reviews.author: J.C.Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hat.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL expecting my luscious locks of man hair to fill to capacity the dome of the hat and I am glad I did. You see, even with a military regulation(though some would consider me out of regs) haircut, I have a good bit of hair. I also have a fairly large head, so the XL fits perfectly. I am pleasantly surprised by the shape of the brim, it came just right and I hope it stays that way. The vents on the side are amazing and will provide a cool breeze to penetrate. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: The quality and fitment were perfect. I roughly measured my head by wrapping it with a leather belt that you would use on your pants, layed the bet flat then measured the distance with a tape measure. I then compared to the posted fitting chart and it was dead on with my really rough measurement. The Medium seemed to fit everyone I gave it to. I do not have a "big" head, Medium is probably the right size for most people. Quality: Way better than expected. 10/10, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Hat, Picture Matches the product.
customer_reviews.text: This hat is light weight and good looking. It does the job well of keeping the sun off my head, face & neck. I'm 6'1" and the large size fits me well, with use of the Dome Draw string the can tighten it up around your head (I'm not talking about the draw string below the chin.) It's a nice feature. I'll tell you what else is nice: This thing make me look like Jack Hanna or perhaps even a less good looking Indiana Jones. It's pretty sweet. Why only 4 stars? Because I try to leave room for improvement. That beings said, for the price, this hat is WEAR it's at. Oh my... - Boom Ha!!!
customer_reviews.author: mikepoint3

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for yard work!
customer_reviews.text: In trying to become a bit more conscience of controlling sun exposure to my face/neck, I picked up this hat for that purpose when mowing or doing yard work. As other reviews have commented, the brim can be a little "floppy" in higher winds, but even when mowing on my lawn tractor, it works great for the most part. I was also concerned with my head getting too hot, but this hat's lightweight and very breathable design makes it very comfortable in all conditions. Not sure I would wear this hat for other anything other than yard work or maybe a hike, but I picked up a Tilley Airflo for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Saves your neck
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hot weather, blistering sun; protects your scalp really well if you are bald; vented, lightweight, adjustable chin and head strap. Good to bring in your car, in case you get stranded in the desert and don't want to wear one of those foreign legion hats that look like you have a curtain draped around your head.
customer_reviews.author: default_character

customer_reviews.title: The hat I've been looking for!  :-)
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hat! I've been looking for a good QUALITY hat for sun protection and one that doesn't look goofy. This one is great! Great materials, fits very well, stays on in wind and if it's REALLY windy, you have the chin strap you can use. The hat keeps the sun off my neck and my face (depending on where the sun is coming from of course). It's very lightweight. The brim has a nice support built inside so it stays pushed out and doesn't flop down. Really, I just love it. I'm going to buy another one....different color :-)
customer_reviews.author: Photo_Nut

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t breathe and head becomes hot
customer_reviews.text: Very thin fabric and doesn’t breathe at all. Not sure why others think this is great other than the wide brim, which is nice. Eventhough, I was not in direct sunlight, because this doesn’t breathe or release the heat very well, my head became hot and had to remove it. Thankfully, i was in the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: great sun hat, really like it
customer_reviews.text: exactly right! just what I need for casually bicycling, and kayaking, in the florida keys. i have lost too many knife fights with my dermatologist to go out without a good hat. it's cool and light and shades my face, nose, chin, ears (it's big so i pull it over the top of my ears,) and my neck, front and back. it stores flat in the motorcycle storage, though i usually hang it from the strap on my bathroom wall. the brim will fold back in a stiff breeze but "stiff" is around 15 knots. and it's a handsome rig; i like it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Babcock

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get burned
customer_reviews.text: I used this for travel in Peru and it performed as expected. All it really needs is an actual pocket. You can tuck stuff in the lining without it falling out but there's always that risk
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Best hat for gardening and the beach
customer_reviews.text: I own several of these. Yes they are a little pricey, but they stay on when it’s windy, can get wet and dry quickly, and have a brim large enough to protect from the sun’s glare.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Morse

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and get this
customer_reviews.text: Combine this with a UV protection long sleeve shirt like a Columbia and you can wander around nature with only sun protector in your face/neck. I have use it for hiking, sailing, rafting, goes with every occasion. The fit is perfect for my big head. Smaller heads can pull the cord in the back that makes it smaller. No big deal there. It will fit perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Urdaneta

customer_reviews.title: I've had a lot of these and this ones a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I may look like a idiot with this style of hat on (it's just not my style) but they work at keeping the sun off and ticks out of my hair and this one is packable. It's very comfortable to wear and the material is fast drying and pleasant feeling. It's soft but not really flimsy. I don't have a big nor small head really, and it fits good. However, this is probably too big for a child 12 and under.. I really like this hat and it stays in my car for when i need it. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jreshow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hat
customer_reviews.text: Second one of these I’ve owned. Bought a large first time and it was a little snug. Got an xl the second time and fits much better. Keeps the sun off. Looks cool. GetS lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: RockCity

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for outdoors activity in sun, rain, or wind.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hat for me. Awesome hat. Retains shape, Very comfortable. Performs well in rain. Excellent sun protection. Not hot when it is warm outside. The strap is sell designed and does not dangle in your fact like other hats I have, you hardly know the strap is there. Good/best price with Amazon. Arrived in 2 days. I have a large head and it fit with some room to spare. Enough so that I wore the hat yesterday with a sweat band underneath and paddled my kayak in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: L. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight sun hat
customer_reviews.text: I like this hat and I wear it when I will be outdoors for more than a few minutes. I had 2 pre-cancerous spots frozen off my scalp by a dermatologist about a month ago, so I definitely need it. I like this hat because it is lightweight and not hot. It's also washable if you sweat in it or get it dirty. It appears to be durable and it doesn't look cheap. I followed the size chart and got the right size (L). I would order up 1 size if you are in between 2 sizes (or if you are only lacking 1/4" to the next size, order up, not down).
customer_reviews.author: It's Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Bent rim,  unable to straighten
customer_reviews.text: I have this hat and really like it for the sun protection, however the rim got bent and we cant seem to get it straightened. It looks dorky with a kinked rim...
customer_reviews.author: alpacaqueen

customer_reviews.title: Strange Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this hat. When it is pulled all the way down on my head, it isn't low enough and makes my ears stick out. I do not have a large head or big ears! The brim is also pretty narrow, so you will still have a lot of sun on the lower part of your face and the back of your neck. Of the dozen or so hats I own, this is the least comfortable of all, although I like the band, vents and fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: My family has a history of skin cancer and must take precautions with the sun. I have a very large yard and spend a lot of time outside taking care of it. Furthermore we seem to be living in a wind tunnel and regularly have gusty wind. The broad rim provides an excellent solution for my situation by covering well the areas most sensitive to the sun, especially the ears. Because the broad rim will capture a lot more air, the drawstring is a necessity and works well. The fabric is very lite weight with a conforming fit. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kaktovik

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat for my wife and another by Columbia for myself for our honeymoon. We traveled to Anguilla at the beginning of the hot season. My wife refused to take this hat off, even in the water, for 11 days. The saltwater didn't cause any damage. Being squeezed into a beach bag didn't cause any wrinkles or deformation. I asked to borrow it, she said "No!" I was pleased with my own hat, and will review it on its own page, but my wife made me jealous with hers.
customer_reviews.author: MortalWombat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hat at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My husband really resisted getting a sun hat. But here in Arizona we really need hats. I surprised him with this Sombriolet and he love it. It looks good, fits great and was listed at a unbelievably low price.
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" 125 lb female, I ordered the medium thinking this would be big.. It is so tight! I do not have a big head. No way to release. Nice hat but would not recommend since it doesn't adjust.
customer_reviews.author: average_earthling

customer_reviews.title: Fits right and makes lots of shade
customer_reviews.text: I live in the American southwest and needed a light weight full brimmed hat. This hat is that and more. Its comfortable and light, the brim stays up and flat. Its even reasonably waterproof! The "large" fits my 7 1/4 head perfect. Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: GregoryJCole

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat
customer_reviews.text: I spend some time out-of-doors walking (in the sun). I recently developed some "precancerous" spots on my face and went through a treatment to remove them. So, I now have to wear a hat while walking in the sun. This hat has been perfect - light weight; SPF of 50+; looks good (I like the light color); wide brim keeps the sun off my ears and face. I don't use the chin strap and it is easy to remove. The only negative I have found is the brim is not at all sturdy and the slightest breeze causes the brim to flip up so at times I look like Gomer Pyle on a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for keeping the sun off your neck
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hat. The wide brim does a really good job of keeping the sun off my neck. The underside of the brim is darker in color and makes it easier on the eyes especially if on or around water where the sun is reflecting off that surface. The hat breaths well helping to wick away the sweat and keep it out of my eyes. The wide brim can make it be more affected by the wind but the chin strap helps to keep it in place. I would recommend this hat.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Protective and chic
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased to say I like the Outdoor Research hat quite a lot. It is not only sun-protective, but also stylish. For that reason, this hat can be worn in many instances, such as gardening, pool party, or shopping. It's nice that it has a cord that can be adjusted around your chin for "wind-safety" purposes. For me, the hat itself was a little bit big (I might have needed a S instead of the M size), but it fit's ok, especially with the chin cord adjustment. The fact that it protects from the harmful sun-rays gives me peace of mind, and that counts the most.
customer_reviews.author: Ioana624

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get much better than this. Thanks O.R.!
customer_reviews.text: I got a medium because I have a small head and it was rather tight on the loosest setting. Stretched out a bit after swimming with it and it's perfect now. Awesome hat. Love it and use it all the time! So glad there were reviews because it said on Amazon website that this hat was "department:women's" and I was confused, but read the reviews and they were all by men so I assumed Amazon made a mistake and was thankfully correct. Great price for the product. SO much cheaper than north face,kavu, etc.
customer_reviews.author: ben harvey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hat!
customer_reviews.text: Can not say enough good things about outdoor research hats. We have one die every member of the family. Great coverage. Light. Stays on. Adjustable. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: This is my go to town hat.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to town hat. Fits great and does a good job protecting me from the sun. Really is a nice looking hat. I had a hard time talking myself into paying that much for a hat, but it is a rally great hat. It has stiffeners all the way around the brim and as such can't be wadded up in a pack or back pocket. Extremely cool has as in not hot and doesn't cause you to sweat.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: OR Sombriolet
customer_reviews.text: Being bald and going to spend a week on the beach in PTO Vallarata I can say this hat is as good as it gets. 1) Wide fairly stiff brim; 2) Good fit with the elastic draw mechanism in the back which works fair; 3) Good venting in top with out being so open you can get brurned through mesh; 4) Top is comfortable; 5) Hat is light; 6) Packs well in suitcase. With the only pickiness I would like to see (a full circumference flat elastic fit adjuster instead of half circumference round this hat is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: zz4350

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and light
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing an Outdoor Research hat for many years. This new one has many improvements such as a longer back brim, improved chin strap. It is extremely light and easy to wear
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It goes with me on every hike. Keeps the sun off my face and neck, and does a dang good job of ventilation regardless of heat and humidity. Of course there will always be some extra head sweat from wearing a hat, but this is by far the best hat I've owned in terms of keeping that to the minimum! As of now it's held up very well to the abuse I've put it through and does nicely against light rains. I'll report back if any issues pop up!
customer_reviews.author: Billasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Fits my 8 year olds head but not mine. Nice hat overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid sunburn & skin cancer, wear a hat!
customer_reviews.text: Saved my brains & my face during two weeks in 90+ heat in Florida. I bought the larger sombrero also. Diligent wearing really made the difference, no sunburn at all! Very comfortable, thanks to mesh lining, particularly if you wet it first. Order a size up if you are at the exact measurement (e.g. I was at the exact measurement for a medium, but found it tight, returned for a large -- better to get one size up and then use the pull toggle to adjust -- more comfortable).
customer_reviews.author: RebekB

customer_reviews.title: Near perfection
customer_reviews.text: Best hat I have ever owned. Packs flat, vents are great for comfort, but netting inside helps keep bugs out, nice wide brim, attractive. Not water proof, but does repel water well and dries quickly, so was great for rain forest and beach walks in Costa Rica. Only improvement would be machine washability, but it does clean up pretty well when hand washed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This has been a really useful hat. I bought it to keep the sun ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a really useful hat. I bought it to keep the sun off my face and neck mostly while boating, but I am finding it really helpful for walks around the neighborhood, gardening, and even in light rain. The brim is still enough it doesn't warp around my face and acts as a good rain shield (as well as sun shield). And, it looks a lot better than most hats. I'm really happy with this purchase, and I am really picky about hats.
customer_reviews.author: gardenpoet

customer_reviews.title: It's great when doing yard work or walking the dog on ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat to use on backpacking trips I take a couple times a year. But now I use it all the time when out in the sun. It's great when doing yard work or walking the dog on those sunny days. It's flexible but holds its shape really well. I really like the extra large brim. If your backpack sits high on your back the brim may rub a little.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father, the farmer. The man is outside 365 a year in all weather condition. He said the hat did a good job but was a little warm. His only true complaint was not being able to wear his ear phones for noise protection (the brim got in the way and he couldn't put them under the hat either.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: The brim holds up and does not bend. Just what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Bennet Wong

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool hat
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool hat to keep the sun off you. Fits good Looks good
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Top quality hat.
customer_reviews.text: My third OR hat. This one, like the others is a great quality hat, effective for it's intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Great hat! Lightweight durable material, well ventilated, nice wide brim. I have a 7 3/4 head, and the XL fit perfectly. I like that the brim is firm, but gives easily in high winds (such as when boating).
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Mountel

customer_reviews.title: Great item to pack for travel
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin and fry in the sun. I was in need of something that could handle the intensity of the sun while vacationing in Georgia and survive being stuffed in my luggage. I haven't made my trip, yet, but I did show it to a friend and she admired it. I especially like the way the strap around the crown can be adjusted to fit more snug, as I will be at the ocean where it is usually windy.
customer_reviews.author: jaba

customer_reviews.title: MOWER MOMENTS
customer_reviews.text: IT IS SO COMFORTABLE--- I FORGET THAT I AM WEARING IT. I THINK THAT SAYS IT ALL---
customer_reviews.author: BAD2THB1

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT hat to keep sun out of eyes and shade around neck.
customer_reviews.text: Love the hat that is so lightweight and is ample in size with circumference around head. Brim is wide for shade. Lost previous one in a rain storm and was horrified. Is great hiking in mountains, going to fairs, and Orlando sites. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher from Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: I went on a 5 day rafting trip last summer an done of the gals had one of these - I coveted it the entire time! Now I have my own at a good price. The brim is great for blocking the sun without being too large. It dries quickly when doused in water and helps keep you cooler by keeping the sun off of you. It also holds it shape.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: It is a great value. There are no brim attachments to center ...
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the other vendor who shipped similar hat from same manufacturer this one came in manufacturers bag with protective cardboard brim protection. For the money, It is a great value. There are no brim attachments to center of hat which is nice because the manufacturer uses Velcro instead of snaps to cut cost. This hat is worth it for nice light sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and very waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The hat fits well, covers my head and neck in shade and water beads up on it in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Terrific hat, and I have many other hats that ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrific hat, and I have many other hats that aren't as good. This has been a perfect hat for my working in the hot So.Cal. Summer days. I'm a photography by trade, and the front bill does not interfere with handling my cameras. RE: "Somewhat Large" comment, I have a huge head - so this hat fits, however, it does require tightening up (which you provided for - All Great!
customer_reviews.author: Dave G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, effective, good looking
customer_reviews.text: Took this hat on a 15 day river cruise. I packed it flat on the top of the suitcase and it came through travel looking good. It was comfortable, easily adjustable to my head and vented well. I wore it for lengthy walking tours in the hot sun and I never sweated, and I am a person who does sweat if any of my clothing doesn't breathe. I would have liked more color options for this hat.
customer_reviews.author: CSO

product_meta.title: Outdoor Research Sombriolet Sun Hat - Breathable Lightweight Wicking Protection
product_meta.description:
Keep yourself protected using the Outdoor Research Sombriolet Sun Hat. With a UPF 50+ rating, wide brim, and moisture-wicking headband, you will stay comfortable and cool to do what you love in the great outdoors. Never lose your hat thanks to the adjustable drawcord, making this hat perfect for those wild adventures. 

At Outdoor Research, we think that life gets better the minute we step out the door on a new adventure, no matter how big or small. We learn about ourselves, each other and the environment every time we get out. We come home a little wiser and stronger. We see the world more clearly, and that compels us to treat it better. More than anything, we’re convinced that if we inspire more people to get outside, the world will be a better place. 

In 1981, a brilliant scientist and adventurer named Ron Gregg watched his frostbitten partner get airlifted off a glacier on Denali. He'd spent months planning a new route in the purest style, skiing 100 miles from the road to the base of the climb. Barely halfway to the summit, their trip ended with the failure of a simple pair of gaiters. Stubborn to the end, Ron refused a seat on the helicopter and descended alone for two weeks, pondering what had happened. Somewhere along the way, he realized he could both fix the gear problem and devote his life to pursuing his passion for adventure. By the end, he knew one thing for sure: He wasn't going back to his old job.
feature_bullets: WATER RESISTANT SUN PROTECTION: A wide shade with a varied foam-stiffened brim width and UPF 50+ rating protects your face and neck from hot, sunny days. A wicking headband keeps sweat and water away from your brow and out of your eyes.

COMFORTABLE AND BREATHABLE: The side vents and external breathable panels keep you cool and comfortable while exploring the great outdoors. Featuring a removable, one-hand adjustable drawcord, your favorite hat will stay with you on all adventures.

MULTIPLE USES: Whatever you are doing outside, this hat has you covered. This sun hat is perfect for beach days, hiking, camping, fishing, tennis, kayaking and boating, and countless other outdoor activities. Easily packs away for travel!

MATERIAL: Weighing in at a mere 3.8 ounces, this lightweight sun hat is made from 89% nylon and 11% polyester fabric with a double weave ripstop shell of 100% Supplex nylon. This sun hat is easily washable and is built to last.

OUTDOOR RESEARCH: We built a company from a feeling: the urge to get out. It's what drives us. Our tribe is devoted to exploring our outdoor passions and challenging ourselves in the mountains, water, and deserts of the planet we love so much.
